Text: Even if this contains the original 1136, the additional 839 files make it well worth downloading.  Thanks!
Thanks, there's a few here that I didn't have.
NO SEEDERS?  90 LEECHERS?  C'MON, WHERE IS YOUR HEART AT!!!!!

Patience, chromepony. It took a while for his solo seeding to establish a few more seeders in his first attempt in February. Hopefully, he won't be alone in seeding (if it's zero, he's offline.  Some can't leave their connection up 24/7) and things will proceed quickly.  His original collection now has 34 seeders.

I have left the files uncompressed as I did with the previous version, this way you can pick and choose which files you want instead of sifting through after downloading the lot!. Up to 4 seeders now thanks guys!

I tried it 3 days in a row and got nothing, that's why I posted the first time.  Not yelling, just used Caps to get someone's attention.  I tried again now and it's downloading, slow but sure so it should be OK.  Thanks everyone!  CP

Any chance of getting a seeder?
We seen stuck at 47.2% for around 5 days now.
